channel.title: Simple question, Please Help
channel.description:
Ok I have made my own server succesfully and I was told before to logg into it using the server ip as "[b]localhost[/b]" It loggs in alright and i can do everything normally. Is this the IP I should use everytime I want to logg in? Or should I use my own server Ip. Also other people can't connect to my server, I know this because I tried logging into my server from my other computer, It wouldn't logg in. Any help at all would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks.
P.S. Sorry if this is a real nooby question, This is the first server I have made.

item.title: Simple question, Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Auszie Auszie
item.description:
@Auszie wrote:

Yeh that’s the tut I used to make my server. The port forwarding section is no help at all :(. Do you know any better ones?

Read full topic

item.title: Simple question, Please Help
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

I think you need to Port Forward, check the Tutorials Section, under that stickied topic “How to make a server - to stop the questions”.

Read full topic
